issue.title: multisense_state_publisher and robot_state_publisher publish conflicting TF for MS lidar

content.raw:
Can you test the following deb?

* http://gazebosim.org/distributions/srcsim/ros-indigo-ihmc-ros-common_0.9.2-0trusty-20170312-155557-0700_amd64%2Bosrf1.deb

I think it may fix this issue. This implements the workaround posted in #15, which isn't appropriate in general, but should work for our purposes. Sorry I didn't notice it before.
content.html:
Can you test the following deb?

  • http://gazebosim.org/distributions/srcsim/ros-indigo-ihmc-ros-common_0.9.2-0trusty-20170312-155557-0700_amd64%2Bosrf1.deb

I think it may fix this issue. This implements the workaround posted in #15, which isn't appropriate in general, but should work for our purposes. Sorry I didn't notice it before.
